author: ttedeschi
body:
#### PR description:
This PR introduces two DQM analyzer for Pixel Digi and Clusters produced by either GPU or CPU. It is a follow up of #35965.

#### PR validation:
Tested with 11634.501 wf for CPU 11634.506 wf for GPU

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
no backport needed
title: Two DQM analyzer for Pixel Digi and Clusters produced by either GPU or CPU
